attributes.action: Bring back Mr  D Twigg M.P. Veteren MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: D.Twigg was the best VETERAN M.P. that we the Veterans ever had.He also knew about defence and he is a man to listen and learn.He is a leader and has gained great skill and knowledge of the veterans and the defence.Labour needs him,And it is your loss in veterans votes.Men of action are hard to come by in this modern age.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
